content:
Sure, here's an example of a combined theme and question:

Name: Shadow of a Doubt 👀
Tweet: Hitchcock's "Shadow of a Doubt" explores the darkness that can lurk beneath seemingly perfect American suburban life. What do you think the film says about the facade of the American Dream? 😶
Hashtags: #ShadowOfADoubt #Hitchcock #FilmNoir #Suspense #AmericanDream
